name: Thomas Murphy
story: David is a highly skilled and dedicated soldier who has proven himself time and time again on the battlefield. He comes from a long line of military personnel and is determined to uphold his family's legacy by continuing to serve his country with honor and distinction. Despite his young age, David possesses a maturity and level-headedness that belies his years, making him a valuable asset to any unit he is assigned to. He takes his role as a Heavy Gunner very seriously and is always looking for ways to improve his skills and tactics in the field.
